rows: Whether the card supports contactless payments.
When the card was locked or closed. Available only when card status is "Locked" or "Closed".
html:
Field

Description

Issue / Expiration date

Card issue and expiration dates.

Multicurrency

Whether multicurrency operations are supported.

PayPass / PayWave

Whether the card supports contactless payments.

End date

When the card was locked or closed. Available only when card status is "Locked" or "Closed".

Reason for lock / closure

Required when status is "Locked" or "Closed".
